summary: Most core requirements appear implemented: app shell with garment selection, 2D text-layer editor, R3F 3D preview with orbit/zoom, React Query wiring for save/list/load/delete/rename UI, cohesive non-blue/purple theme cues, and generated asset references. One clear gap is REQ-4â€™s graceful font fallback indication; and backend CRUD completeness (update vs create, list/rename methods) cannot be fully verified due to backend truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: If some fonts are not available at runtime, the UI degrades gracefully (falls back to a default font and indicates the fallback).
missing_requirements.reason: Font registry includes an `available` flag but the picker and rendering logic shown do not use it to indicate fallback or switch to a safe default when a font is unavailable.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes methods to create, list, get, update, and delete designs scoped to the authenticated principal.
missing_requirements.reason: Diff shows `saveDesign`, `getDesign`, `deleteDesign`, and a truncated `listMyDesigns`, but does not show explicit update semantics (e.g., preserving `createdAt` on update) or a distinct update method; `listMyDesigns` and any rename/update methods are truncated so full CRUD cannot be confirmed from provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile creation/viewing and a profile setup dialog gating authenticated users.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on design editor + persistence per principal; it did not request user profile storage or a profile setup flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/permission initialization via secret token and access-control mixin authorization.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in requirements; additional authorization layer beyond scoping designs to principal.

hallucinated_features.description: Support for many additional garment types beyond minimum T-shirt and hoodie in backend type definition.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1/REQ-2 require at least T-shirt and hoodie; extensive garment enum is extra beyond request.
